name: papra
description: Papra is a self-hosted document workflow and approval software for teams. It supports configurable pipelines, document metadata, role-based access control, and collaboration.
features: Approval workflows: Configure multi-stage approval pipelines with sequential or parallel review steps for document processing
Document metadata: Define custom metadata fields to capture document-specific information and enable structured data collection
Role-based access: Control who can view, edit, approve, or reject documents based on user roles and organizational hierarchy
Pipeline configuration: Create custom workflow templates with conditional routing, automated actions, and approval requirements
Collaboration tools: Comment on documents, mention team members, and track discussions within approval process for context
Status tracking: Monitor document progress through workflow stages with visual indicators and real-time status updates
Notification system: Automated alerts notify stakeholders when documents require action, are approved, or reach specific stages
Audit trail: Complete history of document actions, approvals, and changes for compliance and accountability tracking
Document templates: Create reusable templates with pre-configured metadata and workflow assignments for standardized processes
Search and filters: Find documents quickly using filters by status, assignee, date, metadata, or workflow stage
